name: Who's Watching?
description:
After the surgery of a super cyber implant, you now have the ability to see through others' eyes. However, a secret enemy spy is hunting you down to get the technology! Avoid them and transfer to the green waypoints!

Who's Watching is a Second Person Steath game, where you can only see from NPCs' eyes.

This is an entry of USC MEGA's Newbies and Vets Game Jam 2022 and is awarded for Best Game Design.

Public / royalty-free assets used:

Background music via https://www.FesliyanStudios.com

Satella Font by Pixel Kitchen

Exclamation Point (!) Metal Gear Solid Sound Effect

Basic Motions by Kevin Iglesias

Footsteps - Essentials

AllSkyFree
